snippet: Denver Coach John Fox and quarterback Peyton Manning defended late-game decisions that gave the Ravens a chance to come back.
abstract: Denver Broncos coach John Fox and quarterback Peyton Manning defend late-game decisions that gave Baltimore Ravens chance to come back in AFC divisional playoff game.
lead_paragraph: Denver Coach John Fox and quarterback Peyton Manning defended late-game decisions that gave the Ravens a chance to come back.

headline.seo: Broncos See Victory Slip Away After Conservative Calls
headline.main: Cautious Calls, and a Calamitous Finish
headline.print_headline: Cautious Calls, and a Calamitous Finish
